verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:1
verses.text: Now the sons of Issachar were, Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:2
verses.text: And the sons of Tola; Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their father’s house, to wit, of Tola: they were valiant men of might in their generations; whose number was in the days of David two and twenty thousand and six hundred.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:3
verses.text: And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.
